blogPost.excerpt: Where marketers go to find their people, be prolific, and hone their craft. Subscribe to get cutting edge, comprehensive, and sometimes crazy marketing ideas in your inbox every week. Join the community to connect with some of the smartest minds in marketing.
blogPost.body: Where marketers go to find their people, be prolific, and hone their craft. Subscribe to get cutting edge, comprehensive, and sometimes crazy marketing ideas in your inbox every week. Join the community to connect with some of the smartest minds in marketing.
blogPost.title: Swipe Files - Content, community, and courses to master marketing
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 营销人员去那里寻找他们的人，多产，磨练他们的手艺。每周订阅，在你的收件箱中获得前沿的、全面的、有时甚至疯狂的营销想法。加入社区，与一些最聪明的营销头脑建立联系。
localize.tagline: 掌握市场营销的内容、社区和课程

localize.description: 營銷人員去那裏尋找他們的人，多產，磨練他們的手藝。每週訂閱，在你的收件箱中獲得前沿的、全面的、有時甚至瘋狂的營銷想法。加入社區，與一些最聰明的營銷頭腦建立聯繫。
localize.tagline: 掌握市場營銷的內容、社區和課程

previous.excerpt: It’s a fun & easy solution for you and your friends to find the best movie or TV-show to watch on Netflix. Swipe through media name cards. If all your friends like the same movie, it's a match! Less scrolling more watching
previous.title: Couchers - Less scrolling more watching.

localize.description: 对于你和你的朋友来说，在Netflix上找到最好的电影或电视节目观看是一个有趣而简单的解决方案。刷过媒体名片。如果你所有的朋友都喜欢同一部电影，那就很配了！更少的滚动，更多的观看
localize.tagline: 更少的滚动，更多的观看。

localize.description: 對於你和你的朋友來說，在Netflix上找到最好的電影或電視節目觀看是一個有趣而簡單的解決方案。刷過媒體名片。如果你所有的朋友都喜歡同一部電影，那就很配了！更少的滾動，更多的觀看
localize.tagline: 更少的滾動，更多的觀看。

next.excerpt: Learn Azure Fundamentals is an app which helps you to learn the basics of Microsoft Azure and Cloud Computing by answering questions in tests. App contains 14 unique tests, 269 questions, 132 articles. Learn offline. App is absolutely free. No Ads.
next.title: Learn Azure Fundmentals - Learn Microsfot Azure fundamentals by passing tests

localize.description: 学习Azure基础知识是一款应用程序，它通过在测试中回答问题来帮助你学习Microsoft Azure和云计算的基础知识。APP包含14个独特的测试，269个问题，132篇文章。离线学习。APP是绝对免费的。没有广告。
localize.tagline: 通过测试学习Microsfot Azure基础知识

localize.description: 學習Azure基礎知識是一款應用程序，它通過在測試中回答問題來幫助你學習Microsoft Azure和雲計算的基礎知識。APP包含14個獨特的測試，269個問題，132篇文章。離線學習。APP是絕對免費的。沒有廣告。
localize.tagline: 通過測試學習Microsfot Azure基礎知識
